edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.meta.parameters

Class LegacyParameterXMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.meta.AnalysisMetadataParser
      • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.meta.parameters.LegacyParameterXMLParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParameterParser

    public class LegacyParameterXMLParser
extends AnalysisMetadataParser
    Utilities for processing analysis parameters from suitably formatted XML files; this processor uses the old format, which is just a list of parameter elements inside some root element.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Method Detail

      • parseKnownParametersToParameterList

        public ParameterDictionary parseKnownParametersToParameterList()
        Parses the list of some of the known Parameters from an XML file to a List of Parameters; useful for allowing users to interacitively select from known parameters.
        Returns:
        A List containing a Parameter object for each Parameter described in the known parameters file.

      • parseXMLFileToParameterDictionary

        @Deprecated
public ParameterDictionary parseXMLFileToParameterDictionary(String filename)
        Deprecated. use ParameterParser.parseFileToParameterDictionary(String) instead
        Parses an XML file to a ParameterDictionary.
        Parameters:
        filename - The XML file to parse.
        Returns:
        A ParameterDictionary with an entry for each parameter described in the XML file.

      • parseFileToAnalysisMetadata

        public AnalysisMetadata parseFileToAnalysisMetadata(String filename)
        Parses an XML file to an AnalysisMetadata.
        Specified by:
        parseFileToAnalysisMetadata in class AnalysisMetadataParser
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the XML file describing the parameters.
        Returns:
        A ParameterDictionary containing one Parameter object for each parameter described by the XML file.

      • parseDocumentToParameterDictionary

        public ParameterDictionary parseDocumentToParameterDictionary(Document taskDoc)
        Parses an XML document to a ParameterDictionary.
        Parameters:
        taskDoc - an XML document containing XML-formatted parameters.
        Returns:
        a ParameterDictionary containing the parameters read from the XML document.

      • parameterWithXMLNode

        public Parameter parameterWithXMLNode(Node node)
        Parses an XML node from an XML parameter file to a Parameter object.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to parse.
        Returns:
        The Parameter described by the supplied node.
